metadata.description: Journey with our young heroes as they learn the ways of the Lookouts. The secrets of the Eyrewood forest are waiting to be revealed. The Lookouts is steeped in legend, lore, and peril at every turn. Words have significance. Objects have meaning. The dangers are real. Every young son and daughter of Eyrewood must one day step out into the forest with only their friends beside them.
metadata.name: Lookouts
